name: fast-spell
author: The-Best-Codes
description: A fast and lightweight spell checker library

scripts.build: bun run build.ts && bun run build.types
scripts.build.types: rm -rf dist/*.d.ts && tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declarationDir ./dist && find dist -name '*.d.ts' ! -name 'index.d.ts' -type f -delete
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run clean && bun run build
